test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X couch)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y washmachine))) )
test.nl: Do not go to couch. Do not go to the table. Do not pick the red book. Put the can on bed. Pick up a cup. Put the book in washmachine.
